han at any other time in 
their life. Their body grows 
bigger so that their head and 
body are more in proportion, 
and they don’t look so ‘top 
heavy’. The face becomes 
much	more	defined	and	the	
hair, eyebrows and eyelashes 
are beginning to grow. Their 
eyelids stay closed over 
their eyes. Your baby already 
has their own individual 
fingerprints,	as	the	lines	on	
the	skin	of	their	fingers	are	
now	formed.	Their	fingernails	
and toenails are growing and 
their hands can grip.
